metadata.title: CVE-2020-36386 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8.1.net/bluetooth/hci_event.c has a slab out-of-bounds read inhci_extended_inquiry_result_evt, aka CID-51c19bf3d5cf.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
